statements: DELETE FROM baseball_stadiums WHERE stadium_name = 'Yankee Stadium';
DELETE FROM baseball_stadiums WHERE stadium_id = 1 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM baseball_stadiums WHERE capacity > 50000 AND attendance_numbers < 50000;
DELETE FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_id = 100 AND ticket_type = 'VIP';
DELETE FROM fan_demographics WHERE fan_id = 500 AND city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_price > 1000 AND game_date < '2022-01-01';
